group5.trackerexpress

Class ElasticSearchEngineClaims

  • java.lang.Object
    • group5.trackerexpress.ElasticSearchEngineClaims

  • public class ElasticSearchEngineClaims
extends java.lang.Object
    Performs elastic search operations on claim objects. Each method works by starting a thread and calling methods of ElasticSearchEngineClaimsUnthreaded
    Author:
    crinklaw

      • getClaimsForGlobalClaimList

        public Claim[] getClaimsForGlobalClaimList(android.content.Context context)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the claims that user can approve, i.e. claims that will appear in Global claims list. As of now, that means claims that have no attached approver besides the current user, were not submitted by the current user, and are not in returned or approved state.
        Returns:
        filtered claims list
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
